summary: In the crime world of Colombia, there is an unwritten code. When Víctor and Eusebio, two hoods who bungle a shake-down job, break that code, they unwittingly sign their own death sentence.
cast: Marlon Moreno|Óscar Borda|Álvaro Rodríguez|Blas Jaramillo|Andres Toro|Julian Caicedo|Hansel Camacho|Paulina Rivas|Diego Quijano|Luis Ariel Martinez|Rodrigo Vélez|Hector Mejia|Harold Devasten|Guillermo Piedrahita|Gianina Arana|Jorge Zuniga|Andres Echeverry|Andrés Parra|Martha Marquez|Pepe Gonzalez|Andrés Castrillón|Carmenza Arbelaez|Nicolas Izquierdo|Marleyda Soto|John Alex Castillo|Santiago Londoño|Esteban Patiño|Carlos Velásquez|Arturo Astorquiza|Martin Ospina|Fernando Ramirez|Diego Burgos
title: Perro come perro
